template_data.name: Ghalyi Shan

document_data.caption: A map showing Ghalyi Shan near the pass of Yarlhang La.
document_data.name: Ghalyi Shan
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghalyi Shan''' was the easternmost mountain within the [[A-Ling Shan]] range in the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Geography: This impressive mountain was part of the A-Ling Shan range. It formed the eastern border of [[Yarlhang La]].
document_data.Description: Ghalyi Shan towered over all other nearby mountains standing {{SI|19000|ft}} high.
document_data.Inhabitants: Ghalyi Shan was inhabited by a [[me-zu oni]] named [[Gyawa Zangpo]], sentenced to live at the small hermitage at the mountain until he humbly carried 10,000 travelers to the top of the pass.
